title: Battle Supremacy 1.3.1 – Sensational WWII tank game

title: The Initial 1.0 – A hyper action game about pretty schoolgirls battling against evil
content: The game takes place in a special area called SPE, with a school for students gifted with ESP powers. Every student of the school is skilled in battle, and an evil organization wants to create an artificial girl who has the ultimate power. They have secretly collected combat data and are close to achieving their […]

title: Calories Counter 3.3 – Personal food diary
